thread.title: City snapshot: Real Good Food gets extra £3.4m for Napier Brown
thread.title_full: City snapshot: Real Good Food gets extra £3.4m for Napier Brown

title: City snapshot: Real Good Food gets extra £3.4m for Napier Brown
text:
01 Sep 2015 | By Alec Mattinson 
Real Good Food (RGD) has announced it has completed the disposal of its sugar business Napier Brown and received a further £3.4m from Tereos. Available to members only 
Learn more about our membership packages.
